title: Sidetrack Sally and the Potion of Focus

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: In the bustling town of Everwhim, one wizard-in-training raced through the cobblestone streets with great purpose… or at least, that was the plan.

dialogue.speaker: Sally
dialogue.text: Right! Task for today—pick up a vial of Moonblossom Nectar! Easy peasy!

scenes.title: A Bakery Distraction

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Ten minutes later, Sally emerged with three cinnamon buns and a tiny fire sprite that had hitched a ride in her pocket.

dialogue.speaker: Sally
dialogue.text: Alright! No more distractions. Focus, Sally! Focus—ooooh! A street magician!

scenes.camera: Zoom-in on Sally’s face then glowing sprite
scenes.lighting: Warm morning sunlight through bakery windows

scenes.title: The Street Magician’s Mishap

dialogue.speaker: Sally
dialogue.text: Wait—I can do that! Watch this!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: And then… she turned the magician’s hat into a bowl of pudding.

scenes.camera: Quick zoom and shake on magical burst
scenes.lighting: Bright midday with glowing spell light

scenes.title: Magda’s Potion Shop

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: By the time Sally reached Magda’s Potion Shop, the sun was setting.

dialogue.speaker: Magda
dialogue.text: Let me guess… you got distracted?

dialogue.speaker: Sally
dialogue.text: What? Me? Pfft. No way! I just… took the scenic route?

scenes.camera: Over-the-shoulder to glowing vial on counter

scenes.title: The Shiny Frog

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: But then… a tiny glowing frog croaked in the corner.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: And off she went—once more, gloriously sidetracked.

scenes.camera: Pan from frog to Sally’s amused expression
